data: Dimmity on meadow and water, the eve-star shining over the hill, and Old Nog the heron crying kra-a-ark! as his slow dark wings carried him down to the estuary.
Dimmity on meadow and water, the eve-star shining over the hill, and Old Nog the heron crying _kra-a-ark!_ as his slow dark wings carried him down to the estuary.
Williamson, Henry, 1895-1977; Fortescue, J. W. (John William), Sir, 1859-1933 [Contributor]
